description: Number of dissimilarity relations on an n-set.
references: M. Schader, Hierarchical analysis: classification with ordinal object dissimilarities, Metrika, 27 (1980), 127-132.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..29
mathematica: a[n_] := PolyLog[-n(n-1)/2, 1/2]/2; a[1]=1; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 9}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 28 2012, after _Wouter Meeussen_ *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jan 19 2000
